subject: 2 LIVE Events broadcasting this weekend starting tonight

Ok for those who asked me to keep you updated on live events here ya go. Th=
ere will be two live shows broadcasting this weekend including live investi=
gations and many guest speakers.
=A0
1) Live from the Mason House Inn prese=
nted by Jeff and Nancy Rezman working together with IPRA. They will be inve=
stigating the Mason House Inn in Betansport Iowa and it will include intera=
ctive chat on www.ParanormalTvNetwork.com channel 4. Cost =3D Free Nov 6-7t=
h starts around 8pm EST tonight
=A0
2) Live at the Paranormal Investigators=
 Convention in Charlotte presented by Lightstream. There will be 2 live gho=
sthunts and many guests including conference=A0speakers in the lineup as we=
ll as many surprise guests not mentioned on the site www.LS-pic.org Guests =
that are listed include Ghost Hunters Dave Tango, Steve Gonsalves, Tiffany =
Johnson, Patrick Burns, Keith Age, Tim=A0& Trish Yancey, Carmen Reed, Beth =
Brown, Sepia RVP, Jeremiah Greer, Susan Isabelle, Donna Reis, Lisa Vanderbo=
om, Brian & Anna Marie Byers, Dave and Tom Jones, Ms. Brenda Lee Morrison a=
nd many more.=A0 Cost =3D $10 for unlimited weekend pass Nov 6th - 8th. Sta=
rts around 6pm EST tonight. This event will also be donating to charity! 
=
=A0
Check out www.ParanormalTvNetwork.com and www.ls-pic.org for more info =
on the events and to get your tickets for the conference or to view online.=

=A0
Have fun!
Misty
